name: Shipino
description:
You are in an alternate world where people were destroyed by a meteorite and dinosaurs who are afraid of water became appropriated. You need to water the flowers to keep them from wilting. Each wilted flower can cost you your life.

Game Notion:
The flower changes color depending on whether it needs water.
You can fill your watercan by barrel in ship.
Only couple flowers need to be poured

Control:
ESC - Pause
W/A/S/D - Movement
LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Take, Use, Fill by Barrel
G - DROP
